text: Sylvia Maria Kristel (28 September 1952 18 October 2012) was a Dutch erotic actress who acted in many movies. She was most notable for her role in the Emmanuelle movies from the 1970s through to the early 1990s. The most successful film in her career was Private Lessons (1981). She played the housekeeper who initiates a 15-year-old to the wonders of sex. The film grossed over $50,000,000 worldwide.Internet Movie Database Kristel was born on 28 September 1952 in Utrecht, Netherlands.Sylvia Kristel Biography (1952-2012) She died on the afternoon of 18 October 2012 in Amsterdam, Netherlands from oesophageal and lung cancer, aged 60. She is survived by her son. In September 2006, Kristel's autobiography Nue (Nude) was published in France. It was translated into English as Undressing Emmanuelle: a memoir, by Fourth Estate, 2007. . She told of her turbulent personal life blighted by addictions to drugs and alcohol. Her quest for a father figure led to some destructive relationships with older men. The book received some positive reviews. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1952 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Dutch voice actors Category:People from Utrecht (city)
title: Sylvia Kristel
